page.title: 12OUR HOMES
page.content: We live in families each one in its own home - mostly houses with gardens. Farthers work all day or in shifts, about half the mothers work too. The jobs are in service industries, offices and a few in shops, factories or as drivers. Children are at school five days a week about 40 weeks in a year from 5 to 16. Lucky ones go to Nursery from age 3 to 5. What would we do without electricity ? Lighting, heating, cooking, fridge, freezer, food mixer, washing machine etc. We would really miss them.
